name: KNIGHT SLAVE ~Fallen Dark Walkure~
description:
A dark elf knightess is defeated in a battle over the supremacy of darkness.
Cursed by a black dragon, she needs to be r*ped to regain her former powers!
Together with her twin maids, attack evil dens
and regain your former glory with your body and sword!
Input commands to control the dark elf's sword!

21 base illustrations + all events depicted with animations.
A slash-type dark fantasy RPG using arrow-key commands.
